**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Charau-ka Dragon Priest](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1545)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Charau-ka" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=263" />
<trait label="Dragon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=50" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 59</row>

**Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +15, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +15, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 90

**Immunities**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Twisting Tail** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature within reach of the priest's tail uses a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) action or leaves a square during a move action it's using. **Effect** The priest makes a tail Strike at the creature with a –2 penalty. If it hits, it disrupts the creature's action.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_longsword_ +17 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bite +16,
**Damage** 1d10+6 piercing plus 1d6 fire

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d10+6 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +16 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
thrown rock +15 ([deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 2d6+6 bludgeoning

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 25, attack +17
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30) (×2), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)
- **2nd**
[Flaming Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=121), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)
- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The priest breathes fire that deals 7d6 fire damage in a 30-foot cone (DC 23 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). It can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

**Shrieking Frenzy** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** The charau-ka's turn begins; **Effect** The charau-ka is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) until the end of their turn and can use the extra action only to Stride or Strike. While in the frenzy, the charau-ka can't speak and automatically critically fails [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks, due to their loud wailing.

**Thrown Weapon Mastery**   Any weapon a charau-ka throws gains the [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) weapon trait. Furthermore, when a charau-ka throws an improvised weapon, they do not take the –2 penalty for doing so, nor does they take a penalty for using a thrown improvised weapon with the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait to make a lethal attack.

**Volcanic Eruption** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) **Requirement** The priest is standing on the ground. **Effect** The priest slams his fists into the ground, causing fire to erupt from the earth. Each non-worshipper of [Dahak](/Deities.aspx?ID=150) standing on the ground in a 15-foot emanation must succeed at a DC 25 Reflex save or fall [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) and take 1d6 bludgeoning damage and 2d6 fire damage.

</column>
name: Charau-ka Dragon Priest
